title.rendered: 2023 Women’s World Cup Auckland Semi-Final Packages

content.rendered:
2023 Women’s World Cup Auckland Semi-Final Packages

Experience beautiful Auckland, New Zealand during one of the city’s most anticipated matches of the 2023 Women’s World Cup. The first semi-final of the tournament will play out at Eden Park, Auckland’s most celebrated venue. In addition to the excitement of the match, visitors will have the opportunity to discover why New Zealand is a fixture on the bucket lists of travelers around the globe.

Our custom-crafted 2023 Women’s World Cup Auckland Semi-final experiences come complete with your preferred match day experience during the first semi-final, first-class accommodations at the Hilton Auckland, airport and stadium transfers and more, including and the friendly and helpful assistance of our on-site host team while abroad. Combine this Auckland Semi-final experience with our Championship Final package to experience both Australia and New Zealand during the thrilling conclusion of the 2023 Women’s World Cup. Or extend your stay by adding pre-nights so you can be there during all of Auckland’s playoff matches.

Complete 2023 Women’s World Cup Auckland Semi-Final Packages are available from $2,645 per person, based on double-occupancy.
